title: cpga comparision
content: i wonder how ppl in other clgs get 8.5 to 9 cgpa , when it soo hard in pesu

comments.body: My roommate from Nhce had a GPA of 9.8 in the previous cycle last year. His CET rank is 13 times higher than mine i highly doubt I can even get a 9 gpa in my entire four years.
Sir u come to rvce, fucking hell
if that is the reason y tf  is placement cutoff same
Cuz we have a shit ton of people. Hence more applicants and hence higher cut offs to short list the same number of people.
Well then having a cgpa of say 8 here would give you the same opportunities as someone with a 9-9.5 there for placements, if there's so much inflation.
Doesn't really matter. Most ppl get placed before 7th sem results

I don't think a company really would bother to go to individual colleges and set different cgpa requirements. Unless it's some iit/nit ofcourse.
Ig in the eyes of recruiters bms, pes are the same more or less
so have having 7.5 cgpa gives u same opptunities as 8.5 to 9 in other clgs?
